page.title: 18Clubs in Ashington
page.content:
The various{clubs}in Ashington are:- Playgroup Wives Club Women's Institute Over 60's Fellowship(Methodist) Cubs Women's Fellowship Scouts Judo Club Minorettes Stoolball Club Venture Scouts Mothers & Toddlers Football Club Ashington Players Cricket Club Deep Sea Angling Guides Horticultural Society Brownies Social Club
These clubs cater for people of all ages, hobbies and interests and provide for a number of sporting activites. For a village with a total population of approx. 1,700 they seem to provide a very creditable number of opportunities for people to gather together for social contacts.
